Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2015 04:22PM Lisa435 wrote: Hi everyone I'm in my second week of radiation for breast cancer My radiation is given to me on my left breast and this week I also started feeling nausea about an hour after radiation. Luckily my Dr. did have an answer. I was told YES nausea can happen when radiation is given to the left breast due to it being so close to the stomached hope sharing this information helps. Lisa
Posts.Title: Radiation causing nausea and dizziness marymary897 Motherofall6
